document_data.mainbody:
li al-Mustasib lived in Iris Well Spring in the Hordelands during the mid 14 century DR.
Atabeg Ali al-Mustasib was an exiled ruler of Semphar who was forced to live in the small community of Iris Well Spring located to the east of Semphar. A jailer visited him yearly to deliver supplies and confirm that he remained in exile without fleeing.
Ali viewed the Tuigan horde under Yamun Khahan as a way to possibly retain control in Semphar. The Khahans son, Hubadai, used information gathered from Ali to plan his invasion of Semphar. Ali was rewarded for this information with a spot on Hubadais military council. Alis daughter was also taken as a royal concubine to ensure his further cooperation.
Ali was the father of Dura al-Mustasib.
